heading: HB04911
0: AN ACT CREATING THE SPECIAL MASS TRANSIT SYSTEM SUPPORT FUND AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 7 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8794, AS AMENDED
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04911
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE SPECIAL MASS TRANSIT SYSTEM SUPPORT FUND AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 7 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8794, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Seeks to amend the Motor Vehicle User's Charge (MVUC) Act by realigning its funds for the construction, improvement and rehabilitation of our mass transit system in order to address the need to provide efficient and effective mass transit system in our country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SANTOS-RECTO, VILMA
DATE FILED : 2019-09-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Rivera (000 2020-06-15)2. Villanueva (E.) (000 2020-06-15)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-10-02
